ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿OFFICIAL ICUMENTS 6061- L RECOMMENDATION OF THE STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the nominee selected by Republic of Niger as a member of the Committee under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Population and Health Support Project) to the Republic of Niger The undersigned member of the Committee constituted under Section 1(d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits this recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the Republic of Niger a grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 68,200,000, and a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 6,600,000. The purpose of said grant and credit is to increase the utilization of reproductive health and nutrition services in Targeted Areas. I. The member of the Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such grant and credit, and of the purpose(s) to which the proceeds of the grant and credit are to be applied. 2. The member of the Committee is of the opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such grant and credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Niger and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Niger.
ï»¿-2- 3. Accordingly, the member of the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance. Q-XN sected by Governor for the Republic of Niger Dated at Washington, D.C. MAY-0 7 2015
